Package controller

Class CustomerReportsController

java.lang.Object
controller.CustomerReportsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomerReportsController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class launches the CustomerReports screen and contains functions for user interaction with the screen.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String>
    appointmentTypeComboBox
    This comboBox lists the various appointment types in the database.
    javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<Month>
    percentageMonthComboBox
    This comboBox lists each month for the percentage of customers meeting a month report.
    javafx.scene.control.Label
    percentageOfCustomers
    This label is where the percentage of customers of a chosen month is output.
    javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<Month>
    selectedMonthComboBox
    This comboBox lists each month for the appointment type report.
    javafx.scene.control.Label
    totalAppointmentCount
    This label is where the count of appointments of a chosen type in a chosen month is output.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method initializes all comboBoxes on the screen, including the two month comboBoxes and the appointment type comboBox.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • onActionAppointmentTypeSelected

      public void onActionAppointmentTypeSelected(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      When an appointment type is selected, this method checks if the month has been selected for the report yet. If it has then it calculates and prints out the total of appointments with that type in that month. If not it empties the totalAppointmentCount field.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • onActionMonthSelected

      public void onActionMonthSelected(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      When a month is selected, this method checks if an appointment type has been selected. If it hasn't it sets the totalAppointmentCount field to be empty. If it has then it calculates the total number of appointments of the selected type in the selected month.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • onActionPercentageMonthChosen

      public void onActionPercentageMonthChosen(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      When a month is selected from the percentageMonthComboBox this method calculates what percentage of all customers in the database have at least one scheduled appointment in the selected month. It then prints that percentage out to the percentageOfCustomers label.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • onActionReturnToMainMenu

      public void onActionReturnToMainMenu(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This function returns the user to the MainMenu screen.
      Throws:
      IOException
